item.title: Petit Planet ‘Planet Design’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

"Coziness Test" closed beta now available.

miHoYo has released a new trailer for cosmic life simulation game Petit Planet showcasing the game’s planet building.

“Plant a planet to call your own, and nurture it into the planet of your dreams,” reads the trailer description. “Shining among the countless stars is a life we’ve always longed for.”

The “Coziness Test” closed beta test for Petit Planet also just went live for PC and iOS. Sign-ups and pre-registration are still available via the official website.

Watch the trailer below.

Planet Design Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/petit-planet-planet-design-trailer

item.title: Capcom Platinum Titles sales update – as of September 30, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Resident Evil leads catalog sales.

Capcom has updated its list of “Platinum Titles“—games that have sold over one million units—providing total sales numbers as of September 30, 2025.

Notable updates include:

  • Resident Evil Village (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 12.8 million units (600,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Resident Evil 2 (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 16.3 million units (500,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Resident Evil 4 remake (PS5, PS4, Xbox Series, PC) has sold 11.1 million units (500,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Resident Evil 7 biohazard (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 15.9 million units (500,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Street Fighter 6 (PS5, PS4, Xbox Series, PC) has sold 5.7 million units (500,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Resident Evil 3 remake (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 10.6 million units (400,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Monster Hunter Rise (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC) has sold 17.8 million units (300,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Devil May Cry 5 (PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 10.7 million units (200,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC) has sold 10.4 million units (200,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Monster Hunter Wilds (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) has sold 10.7 million units (200,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Monster Hunter World: Iceborne (PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 15.6 million units (200,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Dragon’s Dogma II (PS5, Xbox Series, PC) has sold 3.9 million units (100,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Monster Hunter: World (PS4, Xbox One, PC) has sold 21.8 million units (100,000 additional units since June 30, 2025)
  • Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics (PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC) has sold one million units (New)

Get the full updated list of Platinum Titles below.

ReleaseTitlePlatformMillion Units

*Unit sales including Monster Hunter World: Iceborne Master Edition: 29.10 million units
